name: Rename with local variable (Calor)
prompt:
In Rename.calr, rename the parameter `x` in the `OuterCalc` function (f003) to `input`. Be careful not to confuse it with the local variable `inner`. Update:
- Parameter declaration: §I{i32:x} -> §I{i32:input}
- Variable initialization that uses x: (* x 2) -> (* input 2)
- Return expression: (+ x inner) -> (+ input inner)

IMPORTANT: The function ID f003 and variable ID v001 must NOT change. Only the parameter name changes.
